category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 12 (Preparation of review documents, meeting minutes, etc.)
contents: Article 12 (Preparation of review form, meeting minutes, etc.) ① The secretary must prepare the review form in Annex Form No. 4, the minutes of the National Pension Review Committee in Annex Form No. 5, and the review request decision form in Annex Form No. 11. Revised 2020. 12. 21., 2022. 9. 16. ② Members in attendance must prepare an examination statement in Form No. 4-2 and sign or seal it. Revised September 16, 2022. ③ The minutes of the meeting under paragraph (1) must be signed or sealed (including electronic signatures) by the chairperson and all attending members.
